name: plonk-proof
description: This is zkp app using plonk circuit

scripts.convert: snarkjs r1cs export json circuit.r1cs circuit.r1cs.json && snarkjs wej witness.wtns witness.json
scripts.gen-proof: yarn plonkit prove --srs_monomial_form setup_2^20.key --circuit circuit.r1cs.json --witness witness.json --proof proof.bin
scripts.clean: rm circuit.json circuit.r1cs circuit.r1cs.json circuit.sym circuit.wasm witness.json witness.wtns
